title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 135 - Overtime Compensation

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §134, as
amd. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
